title: The Sandwich on Main
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. As of October 2013, offers two vegan choices in sandwiches and wraps: cashew ginger quinoa and ancho chile black bean. You can also mix and match any of the other sides on a wrap. Staff is knowledgeable and can accommodate any vegan request. Also sells a variety of gourmet chips.
